attributes.action: To give Police powers to enter tenanted proerties , where Anti Social Behaviour is unable to be attened by enviromental health officers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Police Force, can have the power  enter properties of Council or Housing Associtions , if the noise levels of music are can be of a type whichs causes Anti Socil behaviour, that other tenants for example in flats .are forced to put up with 24/7 , when its not possible council enviromental health, or housing associations, are unable to attend in out of hours situations for example beween 1800, and 0900, as duty officers in some cases from either cannot be obtained or contacted even after 1700, and most housing associations control centres close as they normaaly operate a 0800 to 2000 service.
